name: Sprigguns Captain Sargas
text:
If this card is in your hand, field, or GY: You can target 1 "Sprigguns" Xyz Monster you control; attach this card to it as material. During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from a monster you control, then target 1 face-up card on the field; destroy it. You can only use each of the preceding effects of "Sprigguns Captain Sargas" once per turn. A "Sprigguns" Xyz Monster that has this card as material gains this effect.
? This card gains 500 ATK.
